results.title: Twelfth night
results.creator_credit: John Gorrie, Cedric Messina and BBC
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “BBC Television Shakespeare Series”.
Featuring Felicity Kendall as Viola, this is a production of Shakespeare’s comedy of magic, romantic deception and foolish love. The production features a talented cast, and it remains faithful to Shakespeare’s text.

results.title: Tweekage
results.brief_description: Skateboard enthusiasts will enjoy this hour of footage recording some of Australia’s top skaters performing impressive moves; kick flipping, sliding and grinding across Sydney, Melbourne, the Gold Coast and major skating events. For those of you who don’t skate you may be inspired to give it a try, although the SLAM section illustrates that even professionals are prone to hurting themselves. Good camera work puts the viewer right into the heart of the action and provides an adrenaline rush.

results.title: Twa corbies. Spring and winter
results.creator_credit: Michael Warre, Joan Maude, John Halas, Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films and British Film Institute
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Painter and poet: an experiment in words, music and paintings”.
The first part of a series devised by John Maude and Michael Warre incorporating the works of writers, painters and musicians to create an experimental animated film. This part consists of two short films. ‘Twa corbies’ by anonymous narrated by John Laurie, drawings by Michael Rothenstien (2:24 mins). ‘Spring and winter’ by William Shakespeare, music by Dr. Arne and sung by Peter Pears, drawings by Mervyn Peake (5:40 mins). Photography by W. Traylor and R. Turk, music by Matyas Seiber, edited by Jack King.

results.title: TVG-8610C Console
results.brief_description: Console with power cable purchased on ebay February 2020
results.description: The Hanimex TVG-8610C is an early television games console circa 1978. This two-player console has detachable joysticks with 10 internally programmed games (similar to Pong) and allows the player to customise difficulty levels, automation, and keep score.
description_for_label: Console with power cable purchased on ebay February 2020

results.title: TVA = Tennessee Valley Authority
results.brief_description: An impersonal survey of the dams built, the irrigation, navigation, and industrial advantages accruing to the people of the Tennessee Valley as a result of this, and the advances made by both agriculture and industry, and social services, since the inception of the Tennessee Valley Authority’s scheme.

results.title: TV50 Celebrity Interviews
results.creator_credit: ACMI, ACMI Content Development and Astrid Scott
results.brief_description: Interviews with thirteen celebrities from Australian television. Asked the same questions, their responses are recorded vox pop style. Questions asked concern the celebrities’ experiences of television both as a viewer and as a personality and performer as well as their thoughts on reality television and the state of Australian television in general. Interviews were conducted at ACMI for the TV50 exhibition in 2006.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI, ACMI Content Development and Astrid Scott

results.title: TV: the anonymous teacher
results.creator_credit: United Methodist Communications, Media Action Research Center, Episcopal Church and Jeffrey C. Weber
results.brief_description: Television is more than entertainment, it always “teaches” children and adults. Experts are interviewed to try and find out the effect of television on children. Broadcasters seem to see TV purely as a sales agent, and children grow up to grade three, implicitly believing all the advertisements as well as everything else they see. Deals with the impact of violence, racial and sexual stereotyping, commercials, and postitive and negative values in programming. Offers some suggestions for television programs as well as suggesting action for change. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
